title: Advanced Excel 2021
headline: Become an expert at using the key functions and features of MS Excel 2021 with this free online course on Alison.com.
description: Are you looking to take your MS Excel skills to the next level? Are you curious about the new features introduced in Excel 2021? This online course on Excel 2021 is here to satisfy your professional and personal needs to upgrade your proficiency. Enroll now and keep learning!
courseDescription:
Are you a data analyst looking for better ways to sort and collect data? Or are you simply looking to take your Microsoft Excel skills to the advanced stage? This Excel course will look at the critical functions and formulas available in MS Excel 2021. It starts with a description of dynamic arrays and some key additions in this version of Excel.

You will go through the important functions of Excel 2021, such as applying the SORT and SORTBY functions. Applying FILTERS with logic and sequencing shall also be described along with examples to understand the concepts thoroughly. Next, you will move on to randomizing data and performing complex lookups with XLOOKUP and XMATCH. We will also analyze the application of the CHOOSE and SWITCH functions.

Statistical analysis is a crucial part of any business. Excel 2021 contains some new features that simplify calculations for the user. You will be going through it all, whether it’s the calculation of median and mode or data ranking in a particular order. We will also examine crucial functions in detail,  such as COUNTBLANK and AGGREGATE functions. A thorough understanding of Excel is a fundamental requirement of most job prerequisites in today’s market. So why get left behind? Enroll in this online course on advanced MS Excel 2021 and take your career journey forward today.
